original_text: Even those men that someone has circumcised do not obey all the Jewish rules. They want to circumcise you only to make themselves seem important. They want to show that they have authority over your bodies.
korean_text: 할례를 받은 그들이라도 스스로 율법은 지키지 아니하고 너희에게 할례를 받게 하려 하는 것은 그들이 너희의 육체로 자랑하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: Even those men that someone has circumcised
do not obey all the Jewish rules

sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 당신에게 할례를 행하고 싶어 합니다

sentences.original_text: only to make themselves seem important
They want to show that they have authority
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 권위를 가지고 있다는 것을 보이고 싶어 합니다
